content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment in Mannheim, Maria. I'm glad to have the opportunity to discuss the rental price with you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am Maria Mamani from Bolivia. I have come to see the apartment in Mannheim. I would like to know the price of the apartment. Can you tell me?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Maria. I would be happy to provide you with the rental price for the apartment. Would you like to know the price in Euros or dollars?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to know the price in Euros. Please.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Sure, Maria. The rental price for the apartment is €800 per month. I believe this is a fair price based on the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine
